response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and functionality, it's worth more than $120 to us. However, I understand your perspective and am willing to consider your budget. Therefore, I'm offering you the chance to own this product for $95. This price includes all the benefits and features you're looking for, and I'm confident it will meet your expectations. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our top-notch product. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 95}
